RelatedSentence: Barisan Nasional ( BN ) candidate for the Teluk Intan parliamentary constituency Datuk Mah Siew Keong accepts that winning the Teluk Intan parliamentary by - election will be a daunting task .
However , in light of voters preference for a local over an outsider , he is confident of wresting the seat that he had held for two terms after winning in the 1999 and 2004 general elections .
